--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 2/4/03 6:13:01 AM Central Standard Time, 
> cardhead649@y... writes:
> 
> 
> > Jackie takes a moment to organize his thoughts.  "Well, there was 
> > this Predacon criminal named Megatron - no relation to the 
original - 
> > who escaped from prison and came here with some of his lackeys.  
Our 
> > original mission was to find and arrest him.  But another group 
of 
> > Predacons turned up led by Galvatron - the mutated nutcase that 
> > Unicron made of the original Megatron.  He'd been reformatted to 
a 
> > Pred himself and the two got into a fight.  There was an 
accident, 
> > and the two fused.  Boom!  Instant super-robot!  And Hydras is, 
from 
> > what I've seen, even crazier than his component parts."
> > 
> 
> Standing still, she pondered & let sink in what Wheeljack 
said. 'Functioning? 
> How?' Last she knew.. they... he.. was terminated... gone. & 
another 
> Megatron. How could there be another? This made her far more 
curious. 
> Questions arose that she wanted answered. One way or another, she 
would have 
> them. 
> 
> Seemed she would find this Hydras & find out what was going on. 
But... not 
> show herself until she gained her old form back. Perhaps, if there 
was any 
> memories in Hydras of Megatron's & Galvatron's, then he would 
surely know who 
> she was. But for now... in this updated Beast Machine form, she 
would 
> observe. AS she would keep a watch upon the Ark. 
> 
> "I look forward to my reconstructed form soon. I shall return in a 
few days."
> 
> She held out a clawed hand to Wheeljack to shake his hand. "Thank 
you. You 
> have earned my respect."

"Hey, no problem."  Jackie shakes her hand firmly.  "I earned a 
living helping people.  It's a hobby."
